ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is to ensure that there is at least 1 recorder for every 3 multi- cameras
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( No_of_Camera_Recorders__c = 0, No_of_Multi_Cameras__c <= 3, No_of_Multi_Cameras__c <> 0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c, "Express")), OR( NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), NOT( $Profile.Name = "Order Operations Admin") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For every 3 Multi- Cameras there needs to be 1 Camera recorder.
